title: EcoFlow Wins TIME Best Inventions 2023 Award - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow, a portable power and eco-friendly energy solutions company, has received the TIME Best Inventions 2023 Award in the Green Energy category for its EcoFlow GLACIER portable refrigerator. The GLACIER stands out for its detachable plug-in battery, providing up to 40 hours of cordless power, aligning with EcoFlow's commitment to sustainable energy solutions for outdoor activities.
